SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.view.tui.terminal

Class Terminal

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.view.tui.terminal.Terminal
public abstract class Terminal extends Object
Terminal contains all functionalities to manage the terminal modes and the ANSI code.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Terminal getInstance() throws TerminalException
      This is the only way to retrieve a Terminal instance as indicated by the singleton pattern.
      Returns:
      the Terminal instance according to the OS on which the program is running.
      Throws:
      TerminalException - if the terminal emulator which is running the program doesn't support raw mode.

    • enableRawMode

      public abstract void enableRawMode() throws TerminalException
      Sets the terminal to raw mode.
      Throws:
      TerminalException - if the terminal emulator on which the program is being executed doesn't support raw mode.

    • disableRawMode

      public abstract void disableRawMode() throws TerminalException
      Restores the terminal to its original configuration.
      Throws:
      TerminalException - if the system call which tries to restore the original configuration fails.
